--- title: "Correspondence analysis" subtitle: "Methods of Corpus Linguistics (class 7)" author: "Mariana Montes" format: revealjs: preview-links: auto multiplex: true chalkboard: buttons: false code-fold: true css: styles.css execute: echo: true --- ## Outline - Introduction - Terminology - Interpretation - Linguistic example ## Correspondence Analysis ::: msg Dimension reduction technique for "count" data. ::: Visualization: **biplot**, showing relationships: - between rows - between columns - between rows and columns (kind of). ::: {.footer} Introduction ::: # Introduction ## Linguistic example ![](trump-clinton-plot.png) ::: {.footer} Introduction ::: ## Classic (non-linguistic) example^[The `smoke` dataset comes with the `{ca}` package.] :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="40%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} library(tidyverse) library(mclm) data(smoke) print_matrix(smoke) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
none light medium heavy
SM 4 2 3 2
JM 4 3 7 4
SE 25 10 12 4
JE 18 24 33 13
SC 10 6 7 2
````` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column width="60%" .incremental .smaller} - Rows are **types of employees** (Senior/Junior manager, Senior/Junior Employee, Secretary). - Columns are **types of smokers**. - Values in the cells are **counts**. ::: :::: ::: {.footer} Introduction ::: ## Smoke plot ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca <- ca(smoke) plot(smoke_ca) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](correspondence-analysis_files/figure-revealjs/smoke-plot-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Introduction ::: ## Smoke CA ::: {.panel-tabset} ### `print()` ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} smoke_ca ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Principal inertias (eigenvalues): 1 2 3 Value 0.074759 0.010017 0.000414 Percentage 87.76% 11.76% 0.49% Rows: SM JM SE JE SC Mass 0.05699 0.0933 0.2642 0.4560 0.12953 ChiDist 0.21656 0.3569 0.3808 0.2400 0.21617 Inertia 0.00267 0.0119 0.0383 0.0263 0.00605 Dim. 1 -0.24054 0.9471 -1.3920 0.8520 -0.73546 Dim. 2 -1.93571 -2.4310 -0.1065 0.5769 0.78843 Columns: none light medium heavy Mass 0.3161 0.23316 0.3212 0.1295 ChiDist 0.3945 0.17400 0.1981 0.3551 Inertia 0.0492 0.00706 0.0126 0.0163 Dim. 1 -1.4385 0.36375 0.7180 1.0744 Dim. 2 -0.3047 1.40943 0.0735 -1.9760 ``` ::: ::: ### `summary()` ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} summary(smoke_ca) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Principal inertias (eigenvalues): dim value % cum% scree plot 1 0.074759 87.8 87.8 ********************** 2 0.010017 11.8 99.5 *** 3 0.000414 0.5 100.0 -------- ----- Total: 0.085190 100.0 Rows: name mass qlt inr k=1 cor ctr k=2 cor ctr 1 | SM | 57 893 31 | -66 92 3 | -194 800 214 | 2 | JM | 93 991 139 | 259 526 84 | -243 465 551 | 3 | SE | 264 1000 450 | -381 999 512 | -11 1 3 | 4 | JE | 456 1000 308 | 233 942 331 | 58 58 152 | 5 | SC | 130 999 71 | -201 865 70 | 79 133 81 | Columns: name mass qlt inr k=1 cor ctr k=2 cor ctr 1 | none | 316 1000 577 | -393 994 654 | -30 6 29 | 2 | lght | 233 984 83 | 99 327 31 | 141 657 463 | 3 | medm | 321 983 148 | 196 982 166 | 7 1 2 | 4 | hevy | 130 995 192 | 294 684 150 | -198 310 506 | ``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Introduction ::: # Terminology ## Original matrix $N$ $n \times m$ matrix with frequency counts $n_{ij}$ :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - $n$ = 5 - $m$ = 4 - $n_{\mathrm{SE, light}}$ = 10 ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} smoke_mtx <- as.matrix(smoke) print_matrix(smoke_mtx) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
none light medium heavy
SM 4 2 3 2
JM 4 3 7 4
SE 25 10 12 4
JE 18 24 33 13
SC 10 6 7 2
````` ::: ::: ::: :::: ::: {.footer} Terminology ::: ## Correspondence matrix $P$ $n \times m$ matrix with overall proportions $p_{ij}$ :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="35%"} ### Mass - $p_{\mathrm{SE,light}}$ = 0.052 - $p_{\mathrm{SE,.}}$ = 0.264 - $p_{\mathrm{.,light}}$ = 0.233 ::: ::: {.column width="5%"} ::: ::: {.column width="60%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} prop.table(smoke_mtx) %>% addmargins() %>% print_matrix() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
none light medium heavy Sum
SM 0.021 0.010 0.016 0.010 0.057
JM 0.021 0.016 0.036 0.021 0.093
SE 0.130 0.052 0.062 0.021 0.264
JE 0.093 0.124 0.171 0.067 0.456
SC 0.052 0.031 0.036 0.010 0.130
Sum 0.316 0.233 0.321 0.130 1.000
````` ::: ::: ::: :::: ::: {.footer} Terminology ::: ## Row profiles $n \times m$ matrix with overall row proportions $r_{ij}$ :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - $r_{\mathrm{SE,light}}$ = 0.196^[Proportion of senior employees that are light smokers.] - columns are dimensions in the **row points cloud** - In bold: the **row centroid** (vector of column masses!) ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} addmargins(smoke_mtx, 1) %>% prop.table(1) %>% print_matrix() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
none light medium heavy
SM 0.364 0.182 0.273 0.182
JM 0.222 0.167 0.389 0.222
SE 0.490 0.196 0.235 0.078
JE 0.205 0.273 0.375 0.148
SC 0.400 0.240 0.280 0.080
Sum 0.316 0.233 0.321 0.130
````` ::: ::: ::: :::: ::: {.footer} Terminology ::: ## What do you mean, row point cloud? :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} row_cloud <- addmargins(smoke_mtx, 1) %>% prop.table(1) %>% as_tibble(rownames = "Employee") %>% mutate(Employee = if_else(Employee == "Sum", "Centroid", Employee)) row_cloud %>% ggplot(aes(x = none, y = light, label = Employee)) + geom_text(size = 10) + theme_minimal(base_size = 20) + annotate("point", x = row_cloud$none[[nrow(row_cloud)]], y = row_cloud$light[[nrow(row_cloud)]], shape = 1, size = 25) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](correspondence-analysis_files/figure-revealjs/row-cloud-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} - BUT more than two dimensions - We then compute $\chi^2$ distances instead of euclidean distances - How far are points from the *centroid*? ::: :::: ::: {.footer} Terminology ::: ## Column profiles $n \times m$ matrix with overall row proportions $c_{ij}$ :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - $c_{\mathrm{SE,light}}$ = 0.222^[Proportion of light smokers that are senior employees.] - rows are dimensions in the **column points cloud** - In bold: the **column centroid** (vector of row masses!) ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} addmargins(smoke_mtx, 2) %>% prop.table(2) %>% print_matrix() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
none light medium heavy Sum
SM 0.066 0.044 0.048 0.08 0.057
JM 0.066 0.067 0.113 0.16 0.093
SE 0.410 0.222 0.194 0.16 0.264
JE 0.295 0.533 0.532 0.52 0.456
SC 0.164 0.133 0.113 0.08 0.130
````` ::: ::: ::: :::: ::: {.footer} Terminology ::: ## *Also* a column point cloud? ::: {.cell layout-ncol="2"} ```{.r .cell-code} row_cloud %>% ggplot(aes(x = none, y = light, label = Employee)) + geom_text(size = 8) + theme_minimal(base_size = 20) + annotate("point", x = row_cloud$none[[nrow(row_cloud)]], y = row_cloud$light[[nrow(row_cloud)]], shape = 1, size = 25) + labs(title = "Two dimensions of the row cloud.") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](correspondence-analysis_files/figure-revealjs/col-cloud-1.png){width=960} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} col_cloud <- addmargins(smoke_mtx, 2) %>% prop.table(2) %>% t() %>% as_tibble(rownames = "Smoker") %>% mutate(Smoker = if_else(Smoker == "Sum", "Centroid", Smoker)) col_cloud %>% ggplot(aes(x = SM, y = SC, label = Smoker)) + geom_text(size = 8) + theme_minimal(base_size = 20) + annotate("point", x = col_cloud$SM[[nrow(col_cloud)]], y = col_cloud$SC[[nrow(col_cloud)]], shape = 1, size = 25) + labs(title = "Two dimensions of the column cloud.") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](correspondence-analysis_files/figure-revealjs/col-cloud-2.png){width=960} ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Terminology ::: # Interpretation ## Smoke CA - interpretation :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Principal inertias (eigenvalues): 1 2 3 Value 0.074759 0.010017 0.000414 Percentage 87.76% 11.76% 0.49% Rows: SM JM SE JE SC Mass 0.05699 0.0933 0.2642 0.4560 0.12953 ChiDist 0.21656 0.3569 0.3808 0.2400 0.21617 Inertia 0.00267 0.0119 0.0383 0.0263 0.00605 Dim. 1 -0.24054 0.9471 -1.3920 0.8520 -0.73546 Dim. 2 -1.93571 -2.4310 -0.1065 0.5769 0.78843 Columns: none light medium heavy Mass 0.3161 0.23316 0.3212 0.1295 ChiDist 0.3945 0.17400 0.1981 0.3551 Inertia 0.0492 0.00706 0.0126 0.0163 Dim. 1 -1.4385 0.36375 0.7180 1.0744 Dim. 2 -0.3047 1.40943 0.0735 -1.9760 ``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column width="40%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$rowmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.0570 0.0933 0.2642 0.4560 0.1295 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$rowdist ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.217 0.357 0.381 0.240 0.216 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$rowinertia ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.00267 0.01188 0.03831 0.02627 0.00605 ``` ::: ::: ::: :::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Let's look at `rowmass` ::: {.cell layout-ncol="2"} ```{.r .cell-code} addmargins(smoke_mtx, 1) %>% prop.table(1) %>% print_matrix() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
none light medium heavy
SM 0.364 0.182 0.273 0.182
JM 0.222 0.167 0.389 0.222
SE 0.490 0.196 0.235 0.078
JE 0.205 0.273 0.375 0.148
SC 0.400 0.240 0.280 0.080
Sum 0.316 0.233 0.321 0.130
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} addmargins(smoke_mtx, 2) %>% prop.table(2) %>% print_matrix() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
none light medium heavy Sum
SM 0.066 0.044 0.048 0.08 0.057
JM 0.066 0.067 0.113 0.16 0.093
SE 0.410 0.222 0.194 0.16 0.264
JE 0.295 0.533 0.532 0.52 0.456
SC 0.164 0.133 0.113 0.08 0.130
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-ncol="2"} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.316 0.233 0.321 0.130 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$rowmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.0570 0.0933 0.2642 0.4560 0.1295 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Distances (rows) {visibility="hidden"} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Euclidean $$\sqrt{\sum_{j=1}^m(r_{ij}-r_{i'j})^2}$$ ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Chi-squared ($\chi^2$) $$\sqrt{\sum_{j=1}^m\frac{(r_{ij}-r_{i'j})^2}{p_{.j}}}$$ ::: :::: $\chi^2$ divides the Euclidean row distance by the mass of the columns: it corrects for the fact that the more data you have, the more variability you can expect. ::: callout-tip For column distances the computation is equivalent. ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Let's look at `rowdist` ::: {.cell layout-ncol="2"} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.364 0.182 0.273 0.182 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.316 0.233 0.321 0.130 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.0476 -0.0513 -0.0485 0.0523 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Let's look at `rowdist` ::: {.cell layout-ncol="2"} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.364 0.182 0.273 0.182 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.316 0.233 0.321 0.130 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.0476 -0.0513 -0.0485 0.0523 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} (prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass)^2 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.00226 0.00264 0.00235 0.00273 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Let's look at `rowdist` ::: {.cell layout-ncol="2"} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.364 0.182 0.273 0.182 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.316 0.233 0.321 0.130 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.0476 -0.0513 -0.0485 0.0523 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} (prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass)^2 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.00226 0.00264 0.00235 0.00273 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} # Euclidean distance sqrt(sum((prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass)^2)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.0999 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Let's look at `rowdist` ::: {.cell layout-ncol="2"} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.364 0.182 0.273 0.182 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.316 0.233 0.321 0.130 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.0476 -0.0513 -0.0485 0.0523 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} (prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass)^2 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.00226 0.00264 0.00235 0.00273 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} (prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass)^2/smoke_ca$colmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` none light medium heavy 0.00716 0.01131 0.00733 0.02110 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} # Chi-squared distance sqrt(sum((prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)["SM",]-smoke_ca$colmass)^2/smoke_ca$colmass)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.217 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Let's look at `rowdist` ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} row_dists <- map_dbl(smoke_ca$rownames, function(row) { sqrt(sum((prop.table(smoke_mtx,1)[row,]-smoke_ca$colmass)^2/smoke_ca$colmass)) }) row_dists ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.217 0.357 0.381 0.240 0.216 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$rowdist ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.217 0.357 0.381 0.240 0.216 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Let's look at `rowinertia` ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$rowdist ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.217 0.357 0.381 0.240 0.216 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$rowdist ^ 2 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.0469 0.1274 0.1450 0.0576 0.0467 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$rowdist ^ 2 * smoke_ca$rowmass ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.00267 0.01188 0.03831 0.02627 0.00605 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca$rowinertia ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.00267 0.01188 0.03831 0.02627 0.00605 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Reading inertias :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="64%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_ca ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Principal inertias (eigenvalues): 1 2 3 Value 0.074759 0.010017 0.000414 Percentage 87.76% 11.76% 0.49% Rows: SM JM SE JE SC Mass 0.05699 0.0933 0.2642 0.4560 0.12953 ChiDist 0.21656 0.3569 0.3808 0.2400 0.21617 Inertia 0.00267 0.0119 0.0383 0.0263 0.00605 Dim. 1 -0.24054 0.9471 -1.3920 0.8520 -0.73546 Dim. 2 -1.93571 -2.4310 -0.1065 0.5769 0.78843 Columns: none light medium heavy Mass 0.3161 0.23316 0.3212 0.1295 ChiDist 0.3945 0.17400 0.1981 0.3551 Inertia 0.0492 0.00706 0.0126 0.0163 Dim. 1 -1.4385 0.36375 0.7180 1.0744 Dim. 2 -0.3047 1.40943 0.0735 -1.9760 ``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column width="36%"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} sum(smoke_ca$rowinertia) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.0852 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} sum(smoke_ca$colinertia) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.0852 ``` ::: ::: ::: :::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Interpretation of `summary()` ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_sum <- summary(smoke_ca) smoke_sum ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Principal inertias (eigenvalues): dim value % cum% scree plot 1 0.074759 87.8 87.8 ********************** 2 0.010017 11.8 99.5 *** 3 0.000414 0.5 100.0 -------- ----- Total: 0.085190 100.0 Rows: name mass qlt inr k=1 cor ctr k=2 cor ctr 1 | SM | 57 893 31 | -66 92 3 | -194 800 214 | 2 | JM | 93 991 139 | 259 526 84 | -243 465 551 | 3 | SE | 264 1000 450 | -381 999 512 | -11 1 3 | 4 | JE | 456 1000 308 | 233 942 331 | 58 58 152 | 5 | SC | 130 999 71 | -201 865 70 | 79 133 81 | Columns: name mass qlt inr k=1 cor ctr k=2 cor ctr 1 | none | 316 1000 577 | -393 994 654 | -30 6 29 | 2 | lght | 233 984 83 | 99 327 31 | 141 657 463 | 3 | medm | 321 983 148 | 196 982 166 | 7 1 2 | 4 | hevy | 130 995 192 | 294 684 150 | -198 310 506 | ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-ncol="3"} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} round(smoke_ca$rowmass*1000) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 57 93 264 456 130 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} round(smoke_ca$rowinertia/sum(smoke_ca$rowinertia)*1000) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 31 139 450 308 71 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} round(smoke_ca$colinertia/sum(smoke_ca$colinertia)*1000) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 577 83 148 192 ``` ::: ::: ::: :::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Zooming in on rows {.smaller} ::: {.cell layout="[60,40]"} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} rows <- summary(smoke_ca)$rows colnames(rows) <- c("row", "mass", "quality", "inertia", paste0(rep(c("k", "cor", "ctr"), 2), rep(c(1, 2), each = 3))) rows <- as_tibble(rows) # left table rows %>% print_matrix() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} # right table rows %>% select(row, quality, cor1, cor2) %>% mutate(cors = cor1+cor2, qdiff = quality-cors) %>% print_matrix() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
row quality cor1 cor2 cors qdiff
SM 893 92 800 892 1
JM 991 526 465 991 0
SE 1000 999 1 1000 0

````` ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Let's see that plot again? ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(smoke_ca) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](correspondence-analysis_files/figure-revealjs/smoke-plot2-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: ::: {.footer} Interpretation ::: ## Checking residuals ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} smoke_chisq <- chisq.test(smoke) smoke_chisq ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Pearson's Chi-squared test data: smoke X-squared = 16, df = 12, p-value = 0.2 ``` ::: ::: :::: {.columns} ::: {.column} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} print_matrix(smoke_chisq$expected) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
none light medium heavy
SM 3.48 2.56 3.53 1.42
JM 5.69 4.20 5.78 2.33
SE 16.12 11.89 16.38 6.61
JE 27.81 20.52 28.27 11.40
SC 7.90 5.83 8.03 3.24
````` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="false"} print_matrix(smoke_chisq$residuals) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
none light medium heavy
SM 0.281 -0.353 -0.284 0.482
JM -0.708 -0.584 0.506 1.093
SE 2.212 -0.548 -1.083 -1.014

row_pcoord(d_ca)[,c(1, 2)] %>% as_tibble(rownames = "text") %>% mutate(Subcorpus = re_retrieve_first(fnames, "/clinton_trump/([^/]+)", requested_group = 1)) words_df <- col_pcoord(d_ca)[,c(1, 2)] %>% "darkgray") + geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "darkgray") + theme_bw(base_size = 12) + labs(x = dim_1, y = dim_2) + coord_fixed() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} <script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
